`fac`从`0.3`版本迁移到`0.4`版本，除了新增的大量功能外，还需要注意.en-us: From `0.3` version to `0.4` version, besides the addition of a large number of functions, there are also some adjustments to the parameters of some components, as follows:

跟随底层`Antd`框架的变化，`AntdCard`移除了`bordered`参.en-us: Follow the changes of the underlying `Antd` framework, `AntdCard` removes the `bordered` parameter, please set `variant='borderless'` instead.

部分组件xxxStyle、xxxClassName格式参数重构到styles、c.en-us: Some components xxxStyle and xxxClassName format parameters are reconstructed into styles and classNames parameters

跟随底层`Antd`框架的变化，相关参数重构至语义化结构参数`styles`、`.en-us: Following updates in the underlying Antd framework, related parameters have been refactored into the semantic structure parameters `styles` and `classNames`. For specific components and parameters affected, refer to the **Changes** section in the [0.4.0 Changelog](/changelog-0.4.0).

AntdAvatarGroup部分参数重构到max参数中.en-us: AntdAvatarGroup partial parameters are reconstructed into max parameters

跟随底层`Antd`框架的变化，AntdAvatarGroup部分参数重构至`m.en-us: Following updates in the underlying Antd framework, certain parameters of AntdAvatarGroup have been consolidated into the `max` parameter. For specific components and parameters affected, refer to the **Changes** section in the [0.4.0 Changelog](/changelog-0.4.0).
